name: axiom
description: Battle-tested Claude Code skills, commands, and references for modern xOS (iOS, iPadOS, tvOS, watchOS) development — Swift 6, SwiftUI, Liquid Glass, Apple Intelligence, and more

scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:json && npm run test:budget && npm run docs:build
scripts.test:budget: node -e "const d=require('./.claude-plugin/plugins/axiom/claude-code.json'); let t=0; d.skills.forEach(s=>t+=s.description.length); if(t>15000){console.error('✗ Budget exceeded:',t,'/15000'); process.exit(1)} console.log('✓ Budget OK:',t,'/15000')"
